data.eml:eml: Revision of Australian species of the dung beetle genus Lepanus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): key to species groups and description of 14 new species from the L. pygmaeus species group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gunter, Nicole L., Weir, Thomas A. (2019): Revision of Australian species of the dung beetle genus Lepanus (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae): key to species groups and description of 14 new species from the L. pygmaeus species group. Zootaxa 4564 (1): 41-80, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4564.1.2
